item.title: My Gen AI Aha Moments
item.description: In this blog post, I share my personal experiences and "Aha moments" with generative AI, specifically ChatGPT. Despite being cautious with new technologies, I have been an early adopter and strong advocate for ChatGPT due to its unparalleled interactive interface and ability to understand multiple languages. I highlight three specific instances where ChatGPT has been particularly helpful: finding solutions to coding issues, translating between Chinese and English, and explaining song lyrics.

item.title: Is Using ChatGPT Cheating?
item.description: I reflect on the impact of technology on writing skills, specifically using ChatGPT, as a tool for improving English writing skills. I want to express concerns about becoming overly reliant on technology and how this may affect our ability to communicate effectively.
